p: To investigate if this enhanced replication of VSV-EBOV also boosts immune responses, we analyzed innate immunity after 7 hours of infection. WT mice showed a stronger induction in serum IFNÎ± levels ( Figure 3D), as well as increased expression of Ifna4 and Ifnb1 in the spleen ( Figure 3E) and lymph nodes ( Figure 3F) compared to CD169-Cre +/ ki x Usp18 fl/fl /fl mice. Furthermore, the induction of neutralizing antibodies was significantly higher in the WT mice ( Figure 3G).
